origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenTechAPI.get_investment_cases', 'description': 'This function retrieves investment cases and market analysis reports for green technology within a specified time frame and sector.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'time_frame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for which data is requested, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}, {'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector of interest, e.g., green_technology, renewable_energy.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cases', 'description': 'A list of investment cases and market analysis reports.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenTechAPI.get_investment_cases, 它的参数输入如下: 'time_frame'是'last_year', 'sector'是'green_technology'.
